kiwi.event
Class ChangeSupport

java.lang.Object
  kiwi.event.ChangeSupport
public class ChangeSupport
extends java.lang.Object

A support object for generating ChangeEvents.

Author:
Mark Lindner, PING Software Group
See Also:
ChangeEvent, ChangeListener
